info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 4:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Teller and central El Paso Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 413 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Manitou Springs to near Truckton. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colorado Springs, Fountain, Manitou Springs, Yoder, Truckton, Pikes Peak, Ellicott, Schriever AFB, Security, Security-Widefield, Stratmoor, Chipita Park, Peterson AFB, Cimarron Hills, Cascade, Rush and Fort Carson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
